tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Although Glenda is a little bit strict, she\'s a very good, well-organized, and equitable teacher as well as a really nice person. If you take her class, it won\'t be very easy. However, your English will have improved substantially by the end of the class. It was a pleasure for me to be Glenda\'s student. Hope you enjoy her class as much as I did.
